== Neduva (CT) (627554) ==

Neduva (CT) is a town in the [[Tirurangadi]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 14.81 sq. km. and harbouring 6833 households with total population of 35996 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 370 km. Male population is 17308 and female population is 18688. Scheduled Caste population is 2610 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the town is 627554<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 32 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 34 km. Railway station is at Parappanangadi at a distance of 1 km.
